message.content: workloads/cli-llm/Dockerfile installs claude into the target container, but fails to correctly set the PATH. When running the container I need to type the following command to be able to run claude. Fix this on the Dockerfile so that PATH is always correct.  export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"

file.content:
ARG TAG=latest
ARG REGISTRY=ghcr.io/qubesome
FROM ${REGISTRY}/base:${TAG}

RUN zypper -n refresh && \
        zypper -n install \
                powerline-fonts \
                alacritty gsettings-desktop-schemas terminator \
                git zsh wget tar gzip vim \
                gh gh-zsh-completion \
                yubikey-manager yubikey-personalization gnupg ykpers libyubikey0 pcsc-ccid pcsc-lite libpcsclite1 \
                openssh \
                make \
                go1.25 go1.25-race \
                podman-remote && \
        zypper -n cc -a && \
        zypper -n rm zypper && \
        rm -rf /tmp/* /var/tmp/* /var/log/* /usr/share/doc/packages/* \
                /usr/lib/sysimage/rpm/* /var/cache/zypp/* \
                /var/log/zypp/* /usr/share/man/* /usr/share/doc/*

RUN ln -s /usr/bin/podman-remote /usr/bin/podman

RUN useradd --uid 1000 -m -U coder && \
    mkdir -p /run/user/1000 && \
    chown 1000:1000 /run/user/1000 && \
    chmod 0700 /run/user/1000

USER coder

# renovate: datasource=github-tags depName=nvm-sh/nvm
ENV NVM_VERSION=v0.40.3
RUN curl -o- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/${NVM_VERSION}/install.sh" | bash && \
        . "$HOME/.nvm/nvm.sh" && \
        nvm install 24 && \
        nvm current && \
        npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code && \
        npm install -g @github/copilot && \
        rm -rf /tmp/node-compile-cache

RUN mkdir /home/coder/.ssh
COPY --chown=1000:1000 --chmod=700 known_hosts config /home/coder/.ssh/

RUN sh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh/master/tools/install.sh)" && \
        echo '. "$HOME/.nvm/nvm.sh"' >> ~/.zshrc

COPY --chown=0:0 --chmod=755 \
        entrypoint start /usr/local/bin/

WORKDIR /home/coder
VOLUME /home/coder/git
VOLUME /home/coder/go

LABEL org.opencontainers.image.source="https://github.com/qubesome/workload-images" \
      org.opencontainers.image.ref.name="cli-llm" \
      org.opencontainers.image.title="qubesome cli-llm workload" \
      org.opencontainers.image.description="cli-llm environment for qubesome."

ENTRYPOINT [ "/usr/local/bin/entrypoint" ]

content.text: The `claude` binary gets installed to `$HOME/.local/bin` by npm but that directory isn't on the PATH. I'll add it to the ENV in the Dockerfile.

content.content: The file /home/coder/git/qubesome/workload-images/workloads/cli-llm/Dockerfile has been updated successfully.

toolUseResult.originalFile:
ARG TAG=latest
ARG REGISTRY=ghcr.io/qubesome
FROM ${REGISTRY}/base:${TAG}

RUN zypper -n refresh && \
        zypper -n install \
                powerline-fonts \
                alacritty gsettings-desktop-schemas terminator \
                git zsh wget tar gzip vim \
                gh gh-zsh-completion \
                yubikey-manager yubikey-personalization gnupg ykpers libyubikey0 pcsc-ccid pcsc-lite libpcsclite1 \
                openssh \
                make \
                go1.25 go1.25-race \
                podman-remote && \
        zypper -n cc -a && \
        zypper -n rm zypper && \
        rm -rf /tmp/* /var/tmp/* /var/log/* /usr/share/doc/packages/* \
                /usr/lib/sysimage/rpm/* /var/cache/zypp/* \
                /var/log/zypp/* /usr/share/man/* /usr/share/doc/*

RUN ln -s /usr/bin/podman-remote /usr/bin/podman

RUN useradd --uid 1000 -m -U coder && \
    mkdir -p /run/user/1000 && \
    chown 1000:1000 /run/user/1000 && \
    chmod 0700 /run/user/1000

USER coder

# renovate: datasource=github-tags depName=nvm-sh/nvm
ENV NVM_VERSION=v0.40.3
RUN curl -o- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/${NVM_VERSION}/install.sh" | bash && \
        . "$HOME/.nvm/nvm.sh" && \
        nvm install 24 && \
        nvm current && \
        npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code && \
        npm install -g @github/copilot && \
        rm -rf /tmp/node-compile-cache

RUN mkdir /home/coder/.ssh
COPY --chown=1000:1000 --chmod=700 known_hosts config /home/coder/.ssh/

RUN sh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh/master/tools/install.sh)" && \
        echo '. "$HOME/.nvm/nvm.sh"' >> ~/.zshrc

COPY --chown=0:0 --chmod=755 \
        entrypoint start /usr/local/bin/

WORKDIR /home/coder
VOLUME /home/coder/git
VOLUME /home/coder/go

LABEL org.opencontainers.image.source="https://github.com/qubesome/workload-images" \
      org.opencontainers.image.ref.name="cli-llm" \
      org.opencontainers.image.title="qubesome cli-llm workload" \
      org.opencontainers.image.description="cli-llm environment for qubesome."

ENTRYPOINT [ "/usr/local/bin/entrypoint" ]

content.text: Added `ENV PATH="/home/coder/.local/bin:${PATH}"` right after the `USER coder` line. This ensures `$HOME/.local/bin` is on the PATH for all subsequent layers and at runtime, so `claude` (and any other npm global binaries installed there) will be available without manually exporting the PATH.

message.content: Now lets add `claude --version` after its installation, to ensure it is working and fail during build otherwise.

file.content:
ARG TAG=latest
ARG REGISTRY=ghcr.io/qubesome
FROM ${REGISTRY}/base:${TAG}

RUN zypper -n refresh && \
        zypper -n install \
                powerline-fonts \
                alacritty gsettings-desktop-schemas terminator \
                git zsh wget tar gzip vim \
                gh gh-zsh-completion \
                yubikey-manager yubikey-personalization gnupg ykpers libyubikey0 pcsc-ccid pcsc-lite libpcsclite1 \
                openssh \
                make \
                go1.25 go1.25-race \
                podman-remote \
                which && \
        zypper -n cc -a && \
        zypper -n rm zypper && \
        rm -rf /tmp/* /var/tmp/* /var/log/* /usr/share/doc/packages/* \
                /usr/lib/sysimage/rpm/* /var/cache/zypp/* \
                /var/log/zypp/* /usr/share/man/* /usr/share/doc/*

RUN ln -s /usr/bin/podman-remote /usr/bin/podman

WORKDIR /tmp

# renovate: datasource=github-tags depName=entireio/cli
ENV ENTIRE_VERSION=v0.4.2
ENV ENTIRE_URL="https://github.com/entireio/cli/releases/download/${ENTIRE_VERSION}"
RUN curl -fsSLO "${ENTIRE_URL}/checksums.txt" && \
    curl -fsSLO "${ENTIRE_URL}/entire_linux_amd64.tar.gz" && \
    grep " entire_linux_amd64.tar.gz\$" checksums.txt | sha256sum -c && \
    tar -xzf entire_linux_amd64.tar.gz entire && \
    install -m 0755 entire /usr/local/bin/entire && \
    entire version && \
    rm checksums.txt entire_linux_amd64.tar.gz entire

RUN useradd --uid 1000 -m -U coder && \
    mkdir -p /run/user/1000 && \
    chown 1000:1000 /run/user/1000 && \
    chmod 0700 /run/user/1000

USER coder
ENV PATH="/home/coder/.local/bin:${PATH}"

# renovate: datasource=github-tags depName=nvm-sh/nvm
ENV NVM_VERSION=v0.40.3
RUN curl -o- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/${NVM_VERSION}/install.sh" | bash && \
        . "$HOME/.nvm/nvm.sh" && \
        nvm install 24 && \
        nvm current && \
        npm install -g @github/copilot && \
        rm -rf /tmp/node-compile-cache

# https://code.claude.com/docs/en/setup
RUN curl -fsSL https://claude.ai/install.sh | bash

RUN mkdir /home/coder/.ssh
COPY --chown=1000:1000 --chmod=700 known_hosts config /home/coder/.ssh/

RUN sh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh/master/tools/install.sh)" && \
        echo '. "$HOME/.nvm/nvm.sh"' >> ~/.zshrc

COPY --chown=0:0 --chmod=755 \
        entrypoint start /usr/local/bin/

WORKDIR /home/coder
VOLUME /home/coder/git
VOLUME /home/coder/go

LABEL org.opencontainers.image.source="https://github.com/qubesome/workload-images" \
      org.opencontainers.image.ref.name="cli-llm" \
      org.opencontainers.image.title="qubesome cli-llm workload" \
      org.opencontainers.image.description="cli-llm environment for qubesome."

ENTRYPOINT [ "/usr/local/bin/entrypoint" ]

content.content: The file /home/coder/git/qubesome/workload-images/workloads/cli-llm/Dockerfile has been updated successfully.

toolUseResult.originalFile:
ARG TAG=latest
ARG REGISTRY=ghcr.io/qubesome
FROM ${REGISTRY}/base:${TAG}

RUN zypper -n refresh && \
        zypper -n install \
                powerline-fonts \
                alacritty gsettings-desktop-schemas terminator \
                git zsh wget tar gzip vim \
                gh gh-zsh-completion \
                yubikey-manager yubikey-personalization gnupg ykpers libyubikey0 pcsc-ccid pcsc-lite libpcsclite1 \
                openssh \
                make \
                go1.25 go1.25-race \
                podman-remote \
                which && \
        zypper -n cc -a && \
        zypper -n rm zypper && \
        rm -rf /tmp/* /var/tmp/* /var/log/* /usr/share/doc/packages/* \
                /usr/lib/sysimage/rpm/* /var/cache/zypp/* \
                /var/log/zypp/* /usr/share/man/* /usr/share/doc/*

RUN ln -s /usr/bin/podman-remote /usr/bin/podman

WORKDIR /tmp

# renovate: datasource=github-tags depName=entireio/cli
ENV ENTIRE_VERSION=v0.4.2
ENV ENTIRE_URL="https://github.com/entireio/cli/releases/download/${ENTIRE_VERSION}"
RUN curl -fsSLO "${ENTIRE_URL}/checksums.txt" && \
    curl -fsSLO "${ENTIRE_URL}/entire_linux_amd64.tar.gz" && \
    grep " entire_linux_amd64.tar.gz\$" checksums.txt | sha256sum -c && \
    tar -xzf entire_linux_amd64.tar.gz entire && \
    install -m 0755 entire /usr/local/bin/entire && \
    entire version && \
    rm checksums.txt entire_linux_amd64.tar.gz entire

RUN useradd --uid 1000 -m -U coder && \
    mkdir -p /run/user/1000 && \
    chown 1000:1000 /run/user/1000 && \
    chmod 0700 /run/user/1000

USER coder
ENV PATH="/home/coder/.local/bin:${PATH}"

# renovate: datasource=github-tags depName=nvm-sh/nvm
ENV NVM_VERSION=v0.40.3
RUN curl -o- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/${NVM_VERSION}/install.sh" | bash && \
        . "$HOME/.nvm/nvm.sh" && \
        nvm install 24 && \
        nvm current && \
        npm install -g @github/copilot && \
        rm -rf /tmp/node-compile-cache

# https://code.claude.com/docs/en/setup
RUN curl -fsSL https://claude.ai/install.sh | bash

RUN mkdir /home/coder/.ssh
COPY --chown=1000:1000 --chmod=700 known_hosts config /home/coder/.ssh/

RUN sh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh/master/tools/install.sh)" && \
        echo '. "$HOME/.nvm/nvm.sh"' >> ~/.zshrc

COPY --chown=0:0 --chmod=755 \
        entrypoint start /usr/local/bin/

WORKDIR /home/coder
VOLUME /home/coder/git
VOLUME /home/coder/go

LABEL org.opencontainers.image.source="https://github.com/qubesome/workload-images" \
      org.opencontainers.image.ref.name="cli-llm" \
      org.opencontainers.image.title="qubesome cli-llm workload" \
      org.opencontainers.image.description="cli-llm environment for qubesome."

ENTRYPOINT [ "/usr/local/bin/entrypoint" ]

content.text: Added `claude --version` to the same `RUN` step so the build will fail if `claude` isn't properly installed or not on the PATH.

content.thinking: The user wants a commit message suggestion. Let me look at the changes made.

content.text:
Based on the changes, here's a suggested commit message:

```
cli-llm: Fix PATH for claude and add version check

Add $HOME/.local/bin to PATH so claude is available without
manual export. Add --version check to fail the build early
if the installation is broken.
```

Want me to go ahead and commit with this message?

cli-llm: Fix PATH for claude and add version check

manual export. Add --version check to fail the build early
if the installation is broken.

EOF
)"

message.content: <local-command-caveat>Caveat: The messages below were generated by the user while running local commands. DO NOT respond to these messages or otherwise consider them in your response unless the user explicitly asks you to.</local-command-caveat>
